title: Ex-JPMorgan Risk Czar Sniffs Out a Covid-19 Test
itunes:title: Ex-JPMorgan Risk Czar Sniffs Out a Covid-19 Test
description:
This week, best-selling author and Bloomberg Opinion columnist Michael Lewis joined to talk about a Wall Street risk veteran that might have a theory to track the coronavirus outbreak. PIMCO global economic adviser Joachim Fels came on to offer his outlook for how the global economy can transition from near-term pain to gradual healing. Then Ian Bremmer, president of the Eurasia Group and G-Zero Media, discussed how the pandemic could fundamentally alter the geopolitical landscape.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
